tool.name: SAGA.shapes_tools.26
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySHAPESLIST True output_data_SHAPES $output_data_SHAPES name SAGA.shapes_tools.26 SHAPESLIST $SHAPESLIST INDEX $INDEX prefer $prefer response $response outputType_SHAPES $OutputSection_SHAPES.outputType_SHAPES transmissionMode_SHAPES $OutputSection_SHAPES.transmissionMode_SHAPES

param.name: SHAPESLIST
param.label: Shapes List
param.help: The input shapes list. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: INDEX
param.label: Index
param.help: The list index of the shapefile to pick. Indices start at zero.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_SHAPES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SHAPES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Main use of this tool is to support tool chain development, allowing to pick a single shapefile from a shapes list.<br/>
